variable.name: Age
variable.description: Age at enrollment (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: CLUSTERS_AS_CAUCASIAN
variable.description: Individuals were within the bounds of the main cluster derived from the first two components of the multidimensional scaling algorithm in plink utilizing all case-control samples as well as CEU, YRI and CHB_JPT HapMap controls (CHB_JPT data was downloaded from Illumina).

variable.name: Country_Origin
variable.description: Subject's country of birth (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: DNA_SOURCE
variable.description: Source of DNA

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Subject's ethnicity (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Amyotrophic_lat
variable.description: The presence or absence of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in the subject blood relatives as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection): present= The individual themselves have a history or diagnosis of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis; absent=The individual themselves have no history or diagnosis of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
variable.value: The individual themselves have no history or diagnosis of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
The individual themselves have a history or diagnosis of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis

variable.name: Family_History_Ataxia
variable.description: The presence or absence of ataxia in the subject blood relatives as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Autism
variable.description: The presence or absence of autism in the subject blood relatives as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Bipolar
variable.description: The presence or absence of bipolar disorder in the subject blood relatives as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Brain_aneurysm
variable.description: The presence or absence of brain aneurysm in the subject blood relatives as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Cancer
variable.description: The presence or absence of cancer in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Dementia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dementia in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Depression
variable.description: The presence or absence of depression in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Diabetes
variable.description: The presence or absence of diabetes in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Dystonia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dystonia in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Epilepsy
variable.description: The presence or absence of epilepsy in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Heart_disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of heart disease in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Hypertension
variable.description: The presence or absence of hypertension in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_memory_loss
variable.description: The presence or absence of memory loss in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Migraine
variable.description: The presence or absence of migraine in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Multiple_scleros
variable.description: The presence or absence of multiple sclerosis in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Muscle_disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of muscle disease of any type in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Obsessive_Comp
variable.description: The presence or absence of obsessive compulsive disorder in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Other
variable.description: The clinician interviewing the subject asks about any other known medical illnesses in blood relatives and writes in as comments if so (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Parkinson_s
variable.description: The presence or absence of Parkinson disease in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Schizophrenia
variable.description: The presence or absence of schizophrenia in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Stroke
variable.description: The presence or absence of cerebrovascular disease in the subject blood relatives, to be delineated, as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Suicide_Attempt
variable.description: The presence or absence of suicide attempt in the subject's blood relatives as documented based on clinician interview of the subject (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Family_History_Tourettes
variable.description: The presence or absence of Tourette's syndrome in the subject's blood relatives as determined by clinician's interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: FAM_NO
variable.description: Family number (3000-3999 from Coriell) (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Gender: male, female (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Handedness
variable.description: The subject has a hand preference (left, right), or uses both hands equally well (ambidextrous) (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: LOW_CALL_RATE
variable.description: Call rate below 96%

variable.name: LOW_INTENSITY_CNV
variable.description: Poor data quality for copy number variant data (standard deviation for log R ratio for chromosome 1 above 0.25)

variable.name: Medical_History_Amyotrophic_lat
variable.description: The presence or absence of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in the subject themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Ataxia
variable.description: The presence or absence of ataxia in the subject themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Autism
variable.description: The presence or absence of autism in the subject themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Bipolar
variable.description: The presence or absence of bipolar disorder in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Brain_aneurysm
variable.description: The presence or absence of brain aneurysm in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Cancer
variable.description: The presence or absence of cancer in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Dementia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dementia in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Depression
variable.description: The presence or absence of depression in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Diabetes
variable.description: The presence or absence of diabetes in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Dystonia
variable.description: The presence or absence of dystonia in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Epilepsy
variable.description: The presence or absence of epilepsy in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Heart_disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of heart disease in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Hypertension
variable.description: The presence or absence of hypertension in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_memory_loss
variable.description: The presence or absence of memory loss in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Migraine
variable.description: The presence or absence of migraine in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Multiple_scleros
variable.description: The presence or absence of multiple sclerosis in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Muscle_disease
variable.description: The presence or absence of muscle disease in the subjects themselves as determined by clinical interview; if present, the clinical interview will describe the type of muscle disease and thus may capture disorders that result in weakness, but are not considered to be a disease of the muscle (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Obsessive_Comp
variable.description: The presence or absence of obsessive compulsive disorder in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Other
variable.description: The clinician interviewing the subject asks about any other medical illnesses and writes in as comments if so (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Parkinson_s
variable.description: The presence or absence of Parkinson disease in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Schizophrenia
variable.description: The presence or absence of schizophrenia in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Stroke
variable.description: The presence or absence of cerebrovascular disease in the subjects themselves as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Suicide_Attempt
variable.description: The subject themselves endorses a past suicide attempt as documented based on clinician interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Medical_History_Tourettes
variable.description: The presence or absence of Tourette's syndrome in the subjects themselves as determined by clinician's interview (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: MMSE_score
variable.description: Mini Mental Status Score (the subject has a score on the Folstein Mini mental status exam as specified) (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Neurological_exam
variable.description: The subject either did (yes) or did not (no) undergo a neurological examination (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Race (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: ref
variable.description: Coriell ID (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Smoking_history
variable.description: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others. (Current indicates a current smoker; former indicates the subject smoked in the past but does not smoke now; never indicates that the individual has never smoked). (See phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: SUBJ_NO
variable.description: Individual number (first digit is always a 3 and is followed by the numerical portion of the Coriell ID) (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: Type_of_Control
variable.description: Defines the type of control (see phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).

variable.name: USED_IN_MARKER_QC
variable.description: Clean dataset used to create marker QC filter thresholds

variable.name: USED_IN_PRELIM_ANALYSES
variable.description: Clean dataset used to perform "pre-computes" of association analyses

variable.name: XO_OR_XO_MOSAIC
variable.description: XO (only one X chromosome and no Y chromosome observed) or XO mosaic - possible Turner syndrome, probable artifact of the cell line.

variable.name: Years_smoking
variable.description: How many years did the person smoke, if the person is a current or former smoker? (Number of years smoked total). (See phs000004: NINDS Repository Neurologically Normal Control Collection).
